{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=C6220 |asin=B01N7L06CF |newegg=N82E16825124029 |fcc_date=12/27/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=PY315400332 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3383G;BCM3383GKFEBG, TE1539 P20, E2PB-03 N3B1; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TFI00 |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L8006EM2I-12G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GG6KB-15 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4352 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43227 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54612E |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 WiFi Cable Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/cable-modems-routers/C6220.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=C6220}} "C3000/C3700/C6220 REV:1.04" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Web GUI: http://routerlogin.net [https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/cable-modems-routers/C6220.aspx#tab-techspecs Specs] page claims "Powerful 1.6GHz processor, 128MB ﬂash and 256MB RAM" :but FCC photos show only a single 128MB RAM chip. DOCSIS 3.0 8x4{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }} ===Likely compatible services=== *'''{{Approved by service|Comcast}}''' ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=560 ''Comcast'' device database entry]) *'''{{Approved by service|Time Warner}}''' (not yet on [https://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/twc-compatible-modems.pdf ''Time Warner Cable'' compatible modems list]) *'''{{Approved by service|Spectrum}}''' (on [http://www.spectrum.net/support/internet/compliant-modems-charter-network/ ''Spectrum'' certified modems list]) *'''{{Approved by service|Cox}}''' (on [https://www.cox.com/residential/support/cox-certified-cable-modems.html ''Cox'' certified modems list]) ===See also=== [[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] *[[Netgear C3000]] / [[Netgear C3000v2]] *[[Netgear C3700]] / [[Netgear C3700v2]]
